reviews.content: Idk why others on iOS 12.4 are having issues with Amandus....iPhone 8 running iOS 12.4 and unc0ver 3.8.0-b1 and Amandus works like a dream! Love this tweak!!

Don’t know why it was marked workingg for ios 12.4, doesnt work at all on this version.

Great tweak though. 13.0 and up only as the tweak info page says itself.
Glitches Apple Pay and makes it act weird. Would be nice if it could be updated for 13.5. It’d be worth a dollar for me imo.
Works as expected but shows a white bar on bottom. IOS 12.4 iPhone XR
Not working on Checkra1n iOS 13.5 iPhone 6s
Sometimes displays “update to use cards” error
Thank you dev for this amazing tweak
